tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BalanceMonitor (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_number INT,
    current_balance DECIMAL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE transaction_activity (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE suspicious_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    reason VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  amount DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT,
  alert_type VARCHAR(50),
  alert_message TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE fraud_transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  amount DECIMAL,
  alert_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE TransactionHistory (
    transaction_id INT,
    account_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE FraudDetection (
    detection_id INT,
    transaction_id INT,
    account_id INT,
    fraud_score INT,
    detection_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE AlertLog (
    alert_id INT,
    transaction_id INT,
    account_id INT,
    alert_message VARCHAR(255),
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
